TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ComponentActionsType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of object-bound smart tag with respect to how it was associated with the component.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table describes the two options for associating an object-bound smart tag to a component.
|Smart-tag model|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |Pull|The class derived from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> that is associated with the component overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property to return the collection of smart tags for that component.| |Push|A call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method explicitly associates the specified smart tags with the specified component.|
For more information about these smart-tag models, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType All = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType Component = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType Service = int32(2)
